projects.name: Static Site Generator
projects.short_description: The application that builds derekenos.com.

images.name: Screenshot of derekenos.com-generator Source Code
images.description: screenshot of derekenos.com-generator source code

projects.description:
I built this static website generator to maintain my personal website, derekenos.com.

It's relatively simple, has accessibility, SEO best practices, and structured data (via Open Graph tags and Microdata markup) built in, supports cloud object storage for large static files, and has a live-reload feature for more joyful local development.

projects.name: Cardboard Boxcade
projects.short_description: Custom physical controls for browser-based HTML/Javascript applications.

images.name: Cardboard Boxcade
images.description: photo of a cardboard box with a screen and switches

projects.description: This project explores using low-cost, commodity components to create custom physical interfaces. This initial version is built into a cardboard box and uses household light switches and dimmer knobs as inputs, and an Amazon Fire tablet running a full-screen web browser as the display. The inputs are attached via alligator clips to a battery-powered, breadboarded ESP32-PICO-KIT that communicates input state changes to the Fire Tablet via WiFi.
